description:
Takeru decides to aid Tsukimiya in thwarting Seimei`s World Whittle. Their first stop, Seiryu Tower.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Screw Around with People Desperately Trying to Get By! The Wailing of Seiryu Tower
Hisshi ni Ikiteru Yatsu o Baka ni Sun ja Nee! Doukoku no Seiryuutou
必死に生きてる奴を馬鹿にすんじゃねぇ! 慟哭の青龍塔
